item.title: Hacking A Vestel TV
item.description: Hacking A Vestel Smart TV The 0DRG group decided to look at a readily avaliable voxicom smart TV as the first target. The Voxicon smart TV is a rebranding of a Vestel TV, from a Turkish TV manufacturer. Vestel makes TV’s for several well known vendors: Toshiba Hitatchi Medion Polaroid Finlux The TV’s come repackaged with a vendor specific config, but seem to otherwise be the same. We found several bugs in the Vestel firmware:
